entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , 100 Mile House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:22 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over northern sections. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over northern sections. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
